comments: Green (TOR) engages and quickly disengages on the pick by Drummond (DET).
Drummond (DET) does not impede Gasol's (TOR) ability to get the rebound.
Ellington (DET) maintains a legal guarding position on Leonard (TOR) in the post and he absorbs the contact.
[Observable in enhanced video] Griffin (DET) is straddling the lane line for longer than three seconds without actively guarding an opponent.
Broadcast replay shows Drummond (DET) makes incidental contact to Leonard's (TOR) arm after the release that does not affect his play at the basket.
Leonard (TOR) makes contact with Ellington (DET) during his driving shot attempt but the contact is marginal and does not affect his ability to contest the shot.
VanVleet (TOR) makes contact to Ellington's (DET) arm that dislodges the ball.
LAR and LLS show Gasol (TOR) makes clean contact with the ball prior to making incidental arm contact with Drummond (DET) during his driving shot attempt.
Drummond (DET) cleanly steals the ball from Leonard (TOR).
VanVleet (TOR) makes incidental contact to Ellington's (DET) shoulder during his shooting motion that does not affect his play at the basket.
Ellington (DET) maintains legal guarding position as he makes hand-on-ball contact to Leonard (TOR) during his driving shot attempt.
Green (TOR) maintains a legal guarding position on Griffin (DET) during the drive and he absorbs the contact.
Gasol (TOR) makes incidental contact to Griffin's (DET) off-arm during his shooting motion that does not affect his driving shot attempt.
Gasol (TOR) makes marginal contact to Drummond's (DET) body but doesn't affect his ability to gather the rebound.
Leonard (TOR) makes contact to Jackson's (DET) arm during his drive.
Gasol (TOR) establishes himself in a screening position in the path of Jackson (DET) and gives him room to avoid the contact.
There is a correctly called delay of game.
Siakam (TOR) makes contact to the body of Jackson (DET) that affects his SQBR.
Drummond (DET) and Gasol (TOR) engage and disengage off ball.
Leonard (TOR) and Griffin (DET) make incidental contact with each other as they make natural moves towards the basketball during the rebound.
[Observable in enhanced video] Griffin (DET) splits his feet.
Siakam (TOR) commits a take foul on Griffin (DET).
[Observable in enhanced video] Gasol (TOR) enters the lane before the release of the free throw.
Griffin (DET) commits a take foul on Leonard (TOR).
